channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Drainage and Sanitation
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Level Basic Q-1 What is Sanitation and Drainage ?§ Sanitation is the process where waste is either disposed hygienically or recycled while drainage can be natural or artificial process of removing water from a given area. When dealing with property sanitation and drainage, there exit different types of systems which ensures that strict policy and practices are followed for health and hygienic measures. Q-2 What are Above Ground Discharge Systems ?

item.title: Basic Q & A
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Electrical Principles§ Level Basic Q-1 What is the current relevant UK standards for the electrical work ?§ BS 7671:2018 It covers requirements for design, erection and verification of electrical installations to provide safety and proper functioning for the intended use. Q-2 Some standard also use EN after BS what does it mean ?§ EN indicates European number, a number shows that it meets not only British standard but also European standards - Q-3 Why Building Regulations Documents are important ?

item.title: Basic Q & A
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Central Heating question and answer§ Level Basic Q-1 Bedroom RST should be set to what temperature ?§ 20 Degree Centigrade Bathroom temperature should be set at 23 Degree Centigrade. Q-2 What amp fuse cartridge is used in fused spar linked to a boiler ?§ The fused spar has 3 amp cartridge All boilers requires 1 amp. While MCB ( mini circuit board ) is of 6 amp Q-3 What device reduces possible noise and boiler lock out ?

item.title: Common Plumbing Process
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Common Plumbing Processing basic question and answers§ Level Basic Q-1 What plastic pipes are used in for sanitation, drainage and rain water ?§ Mainly PVC **Polyvinyl chloride**and ABS **Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene** are used for the above purposes. PVC comes in different types. CPVC: Chlorinated Polyvinyl chloride: They are produced by chlorination of PVC resin to make it more flexible than mere PVC, they can be used for both cold and hot water due to tolerating heat up to 180 degree Fahrenheit.

item.title: Introduction
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Hugo Bootstrap Theme(HBS) is a fast, responsive, multipurpose and feature-rich Hugo theme. It is used for blog and document sites typically.
